special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
descriptions: Aerisi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Howling Defeat.
descriptions: When Aerisi drops to 0 hit points, her body disappears in a howling whirlwind that disperses quickly and harmlessly. Anything she is wearing or carrying is left behind.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day).
descriptions: If Aerisi fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Aerisi is a 12th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Aerisi has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): gust, mage hand, message, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): gust, mage hand, message, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): charm person, feather fall, mage armor, thunderwave
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): charm person, feather fall, mage armor, thunderwave

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): dust devil, gust of wind, invisibility
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): dust devil, gust of wind, invisibility

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (3 slots): fly, gaseous form, lightning bolt
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 3rd level (3 slots): fly, gaseous form, lightning bolt

descriptions.raw: * 4th level (3 slots): ice storm, storm sphere
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 4th level (3 slots): ice storm, storm sphere

descriptions.raw: * 5th level (2 slots): cloudkill, seeming (cast each day)
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 5th level (2 slots): cloudkill, seeming (cast each day)

actions.name: Windvane.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage, or 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.
